synopsis.text: Nazuna and Nori are the newest residents of the vibrant Hidamari Apartments, joining the returning students of Yamabuki High School for another year of art, friendship, and daily life. As Yuno and Miyako enter their second year, they take on the responsibility of helping the newcomers adjust to their new home, while Sae and Hiro, now third-years, continue to provide guidance and support. The Hidamari Apartments are buzzing with excitement as the group navigates new challenges, explores their passions, and forms unbreakable bonds in this heartwarming slice-of-life anime. With each day bringing fresh experiences and surprises, the girls of Hidamari will face the ups and downs of life together, always finding laughter and warmth in their shared journey.
